item.title: Мобильники перспективнее букридеров
item.description: App Attack: Mobile Reading Though we’ve recently noticed a few more Kindles on the subway, mobile phones are infinitely more common. As more consumers choose to read e-books on their smartphones rather than purchase standalone e-reading devices, publishers are working to create apps and other iPhone-ready content. Большой обзор растущего рынка.
